attributes.action: Allow 16 to 18 teenagers to take part in a 2nd EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details: This petition was started by the UK's concerned parents and grandparents but we would like the petition to be specifically signed by teenagers who are 16 to 18 years old.
attributes.background: Whether the UK leaves the EU or not, it is the teenagers of today who will burden our country's future responsibility. We the undersigned 16 to 18 year olds call upon HM Government to allow us to take a part in a 2nd Referendum.
